name: URLSessionUploadTask
desc: A URL session task that uploads data to the network in a request body.

items.name: uploadTask
items.desc: Creates a task that performs an HTTP request for the specified URL request object and uploads the provided data.

items.name: uploadTask
items.desc: Creates a task that performs an HTTP request for uploading the specified file.

items.name: uploadTask
items.desc: Creates a task that performs an HTTP request for uploading data based on the specified URL request.
